title: Battles Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 27 + tracks of Epic, Battle-themed, orchestral audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything with a Historical Battle feel, a mixture of heavy, violent and tense, to foreboding, reflective and tragic. Mostly suitable for period set games of any genre as long as there are swords, and maybe, dragons. From the heat of battle, to the aftermath, the foreboding tension to the tragedy of loss, this pack covers all this and more...


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Battles Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is an epic pack of exciting, orchestral tracks written for any project involving period battle. Includes full tracks perfect for menus and in-game action plus some extras for Opening and Closing moments.


BATTLES MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE main full tracks of sweeping, epic, orchestral battle themes: LISTEN HERE

- EIGHTEEN adaptations of the main tracks for variation and looping: LISTEN HERE and HERE


MAIN THEMES [each comes with two variations + extras]

1 - A Hero - [02:08]

2 - Brooding Tension - [02:04]

3 - Epilogue - [02:12]

4 - FIGHT - [02:02]

5 - Hope - [02:04]

6 - Let Battle Commence - [02:04]

7 - On the Horizon- [02:11]

8 - The Aftermath - [02:06]

9 - The Arrival - [01:55]
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All tracks are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility.

- Selection of EXTRA tracks for punctuation.

- 58 Minutes of Fully Mastered tracks ready for import

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre


Number of Audio Wavs: 36

Number of Audio Cues: 36

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 58:45

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
